tool_description: Twitter public and private data API for search, Tweets, users, followers, images, media and more.
name: Twitter_v4
title: Twitter

api_list.name: v2 / User Followers

required_parameters.description:
User ID

Use the `User By Screen Name` endpoint to find the ID from a username.

api_list.name: v1.1 / Users

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description:
User IDs

A comma separated list of User IDs. Up to `100` are allowed in a single request.

optional_parameters.name: usernames
optional_parameters.description:
User screen names

A comma separated list of Usernames. Up to `100` are allowed in a single request.

api_list.name: v1.1 / Tweet Retweeters IDs

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Tweet ID

api_list.name: v1.1 / Search Tweets

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Search query

optional_parameters.name: until
optional_parameters.description: Returns tweets created before the given date. Date should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. Keep in mind that the search index has a 7-day limit. In other words, no tweets will be found for a date older than one week.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: since_id
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID. There are limits to the number of Tweets which can be accessed through the API. If the limit of Tweets has occured since the since_id, the since_id will be forced to the oldest ID available.

api_list.name: v1.1 / User Timeline

optional_parameters.name: since_id
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (that is, more recent than) the specified ID. There are limits to the number of Tweets that can be accessed through the API. If the limit of Tweets has occured since the since_id, the since_id will be forced to the oldest ID available.

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description:
Username

*Exactly one of **User ID** or **Username** must be provided.*

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than (that is, older than) or equal to the specified ID.
